description.en-US:
**Scryfall Enhancer** adds helpful features to the [Scryfall](https://scryfall.com/) card search experience.

In **version 0.1**, it introduces a copy (📋) button that lets you **copy all card names** from your search results to your clipboard, using the Scryfall API behind the scenes.

Future versions will include more enhancements and potentially integrations with platforms like Cardmarket.

Got ideas? Open a suggestion on [GitHub](https://github.com/tiggerdine/magic/issues)!
